title: Sexually #Open with Elle Chase
itunes:title: Sexually #Open with Elle Chase
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Emily is joined by friend, sex educator, writer, & speaker Elle Chase to give you insight on new sex-positive dating trends, and she’s taking your calls. She gives you tech tips on how to find matches that align with your...
description:
On today’s show, Emily is joined by friend, sex educator, writer, & speaker Elle Chase to give you insight on new sex-positive dating trends, and she’s taking your calls.

She gives you tech tips on how to find matches that align with your sexual preferences, ways to make sex conversations sound more, well, sexy (you know, so everyone can chime in), and how to pull the passion out of your partner during sex.  

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE: Cal Exotics, Veritas Farms, Uberlube, SiriusXM, Apex.

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex talk, tips, & tricks visit sexwithemily.com

For more information on Elle Chase, click HERE.

For more information on #Open, click HERE.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
